content: giving some gift cards this season crochet this cute stocking and then tuck a gift card inside to make something extra special for the recipient you could also hang them on the christmas tree or add them to presents as gift toppers your pdf purchase is sent to you as an instant download so you can start crocheting today the digital pattern includes written instructions with step by step photos all patterns are written in english in us crochet terms the finished stocking is about 5 25 tall you ll need -yarn in the colors pictured main color is worsted weight trim is bulky weight - a specific yarn list is included in the pattern -size h/5 00mm crochet hook -yarn needle -stitch marker -beginner to intermediate crochet skill level the mini stocking pattern is also available for free on my blog www crochettoplay com this pdf is available as a service to crocheters who would like the pattern to be printer friendly ad-free and with more detailed picture support © 2024 crochet to play all rights reserved designed and written by jennifer percival this pattern is property of crochet to play please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or images in part or in whole thank you
